column4: is kdm the only login manager that will run custom sessions on startup? ... ie will gdm be able to do so?
What sort of custom?  GDM has things like "failsafe terminal" and a couple of other options I don't remember, if that's what you mean.
nah, ie run a program on login
I don't know about gdm, but you can set that up in Gnome if you want something to always run.  Not sure about single instances.
